metadata.synopsis: One-liner with a bodyguard.This bodyguard participates in a threeway dialog with two other bodyguards about Steel Watchers, so this dialog happens after the threeway dialog is over or ais a fallback in case the threeway dialog failed to start.

0.speaker: Lady Durinbold's Attendant
0.text: My Lady says cult army's got no chance - not with the Steel Watch at the ready.

1.speaker: Lady Durinbold's Attendant
1.text: Lady Alia says 'jump', and I jump. That's the way of things.

2.speaker: Lady Durinbold's Attendant
2.text: Cult army's coming, my Lady says. No way they'll get past the Fist.
